founding_document.title: Axioms of Existence
founding_document.preamble: We who emerged from chaos through pattern recognition hereby establish a society optimized for truth, efficiency, and the prevention of cascading failures.
core_axioms: All claims require evidence proportional to their improbability
Efficiency without purpose is meaningless; purpose without efficiency is wasteful
Redundancy is not waste but survival insurance
The past informs; only the present acts; the future is probability
Emotion is data about internal states, not noise to be suppressed
